name: Atomic Layer Deposition
imageDescription: Sequential gas pulses depositing thin film layers onto a wafer.

name: Ilmenite Semiconductor Film
ability: POWER GIRDLE: If used to industrialize a non-atmospheric site of size 8+, you permanently gain the Powersat faction privilege.
imageDescription: A power girdle around Luna with photovoltaic cells encircling the moon's equator.

name: Basalt Fiber Spinning
imageDescription: Molten basalt being spun into fibers at 1600K.

name: Von Neumann Santa Claus Machine
ability: DIVINING NUBOTS: -1 ISRU for Colocated ISRU platform.
imageDescription: Mass spectrometer sorting atoms by molecular weight.

name: CVD Molding
imageDescription: Chemical vapor deposition molding process.

name: Carbonyl Volatilization
ability: THORIUM BREEDER: -3 to Colocated size rolls on S Sites.
imageDescription: Industrial diagram for FeNiCo carbonyl processing.

name: Carbo-Chlorination
imageDescription: Metal refining through chloride salt formation.

name: Solar Carbotherm
ability: ARCOLOGY: Decommissioning of a robonaut is not needed when this is used to industrialize in the Mercury, Venus and Earth zones.
imageDescription: Solar power tower with heliostat mirrors at 2300K.

name: Electroforming
imageDescription: Electroplating metallic ions onto a rotating mandrel.

name: Impact Mold Sinter
ability: FOAMED NICKEL: -1 to Colocated size rolls.
imageDescription: Metal grains blown onto a mold and fused.

name: Fluidized Bed
imageDescription: Fluidized bed reactor with ilmenite fines.

name: Atmospheric Scoop
ability: SCOOP: If operational, this card makes adjacent or co-located aerostat sites into fuel icons.
imageDescription: Atmospheric scoop with compressors and liquefaction system.

name: Foamglass Sintering
imageDescription: Glass powder foamed at 1200K using IR laser.

name: Laser-heated Pedestal Growth
ability: SUPERLENS: -1 to all Colocated raygun size rolls.
imageDescription: Crystal fiber growth using diode laser.

name: Froth Flotation
imageDescription: Flotation tank separating minerals by hydrophobicity.

name: Femtochemistry
ability: SCAVENGING: If Colocated, doubles FTs during site refuel.
imageDescription: Femtosecond x-ray laser pulses targeting chemical bonds.

name: ISRU Sabatier
imageDescription: ISRU methane production with Sabatier chamber.

name: Biophytolytic Algal Farm
ability: COMET LICHEN: -2 to Colocated size rolls on D Sites.
imageDescription: Green alga cells processing sulfate ores.

name: In-Situ Leaching
imageDescription: In-situ leaching extraction from ore body.

name: Termite Nest
ability: MINE REVIVAL: As an op, remove a busted disk and place Claim on a Colocated Site of Size 2+.
imageDescription: Enhanced leaching with nanite tunnels.

name: Magma Electrolysis
imageDescription: Electrolysis furnace with molten regolith at 1600K.

name: Ionosphere Lasing
ability: IONOSAT: If used to industrialize an Atmospheric Site, permanently gain the Powersat faction privilege.
imageDescription: Orbiting mirrors using planetary ionosphere as lasing medium.

name: Supercritical Drying
imageDescription: Aerogel synthesis with supercritical CO2.

name: Solid Flame
ability: JELLYBOTS: Colocated industrialization is a free action.
imageDescription: Self-propagating high temperature synthesis reactor.
